response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking the pork chop out of the fridge. The robot now has the pork chop in its inventory. The next subtask is to freeze the pork chop.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Take the pork chop out of the fridge.
(3) Freeze the pork chop.
(4) Move the robot to the countertop.
(5) Take a plate from the countertop.
(6) Put the frozen pork chop on the plate.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Freeze the pork chop
    pork_chop = registry(env, "pork_chop_188")
    freeze(robot, pork_chop)
    donothing(env)
